TopicTitle: A survey for you, KSP Forums!

Articles.Content:
Hello, I am a student studying IGCSE media, and for our coursework we are required to do a questionnaire for research. It would be really nice if you could take a minute or two to respond to it, thank you very much!

Here is the questionnaire/survey: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1fK5QCrNiUF0bY3oVeVCsmqrGjwDruACFhieRl4pGrSY/viewform?usp=send_form
done, but to what purpose do you wish to know my username?

I do apologize if it makes the survey a little shady, but I'm not planning to do anything nefarious with the data. I'll remove it if it's an invasion to privacy.

Edited October 12, 2014 by suclearnub
Y ou could add an option to balance rocketry and payload
Interesting survey. Would it be prodding to much to ask what this course is for or what you are doing at Uni?
